summary: Replaces the Twin Souls perk with the Soulmaster perk, which allows the player to conjure multiple atronachs/undead/etc., including permanent thralls.
descriptionHtml:
This mod replaces the Twin Souls perk with the Soulmaster perk.  It allows you to conjure multiple amounts of:
- Atronachs
- Undead
- Atronach/undead thralls
- Summonable creatures such as familiars
- Summonable creatures added by other mods (such as Midas Magic)

There are two options, one which allows you to conjure up to ten creatures at once and one that is effectively unlimited.

I will try and get some more screenshots up soon.  Feel free to upload ones of your own.

To Install:
Place the .esps in your data file and enable them.

Compatibility:
This is a standalone mod and will not conflict with any mod that does not alter the Twin Souls perk.
author: DamienBlair
